name: Juicy Cheeks
description:
Accompany this cute hamster on its journey of self discovery through violence.

This game was made as part of a school project at Charles University in Prague. 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Shoot
  • Shift - Rage
  • Esc - Pause menu
  • Mouse - Navigation in menu

Creators:

  • Anna Vičíková - Project manager, designer, lead programmer, sound designer
  • Jan Kutálek - Lead designer, programmer, level designer
  • Veronika Petrova - Lead artist, designer
  • Tomáš Zeman - Programmer
  • Merve Tuncel - Mentor
